title: The Cancer Quandary: A Thirty eight year survival journey
description: Jay Lynne LBCAI was first diagnosed with Hodgkin's Lymphoma (lymph cancer) at the age of twenty eight. Thirty eight years on her personal journey as well as her work with others has given her great insight into this devastating disease. She went from being four stone and bedridden to hiking and cycling in just four months. Many cancers did not even exist until the twentieth century. They have arrived on the wave of industrialisation and our modern lifestyle. A closer look at how we live our lives is vital.
author: Jay Lynne
